System Administration

Work Area File Manager

Upload, edit and delete files from the server

Customization Area File Manager

Upload, edit and delete files from the server

Verify Federated Search Connections

Test connections for external catalogs

Configure Registry Attributes

Editor for registry attributes

Query Tool

Check, update, delete OPC DB data

Clear Cache

Resets the following Caches:

  • Services cache (cache of calling of ResponsibilityService.getResponsibilityActions, CurrencyConversionService, EntitlementService, FederatedSearchConnector.search)
  • Groovy pages cache (views and templates)
  • Hibernate cache (hibernate session cache)
  • Configuration cache (cache of RegistryAttributeValues)

Clear Static Resources Cache

Clear cache for static resources (pictures, .css, .js files) to reload resources after update

Update Logging Settings

Adjusting log4j configuration

Weceem Content Indexing

Refresh Solr indices for data stored in built-in CMS.

System Info

Log Files

Read log files

Search Server
  • To find a product in Solr, please write a query like 'productId:ProductIdToFind_' (productId:"Samsung SF 360") in 'Solr/Lucene Statement' section.
  • To find all of the products use 'key:[* TO *]'.
  • To find a product by attributes write 'AttrValue_string_whatAttributeNeedToFind:value' (AttrValue_string_IsEnvironmentallyPreferred:"true").
  • To find a product by contracts write 'contractIds:value' (contractIds:"HardwareEhand").
  • Also, you can use restrictions together like 'key:[* TO *] -contractIds:"HardwareEhand" +AttrValue_string_IsEnvironmentallyPreferred:"true"'
